projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: IIITKRescources
projects.bodyText: Built a website for the college students using React.js, Node.js and mongodb,cloudianry,Auth0, providing a platform for take help and resources and updates. Ensured secure user authentication and real-time data synchronization for enhanced user interaction.

projects.title: CraveCast: Discover, crave, order: Food at fingertips
projects.bodyText: Welcome to CraveCast, the innovative food delivery app that revolutionizes the way you discover, crave, and order delicious meals from nearby restaurants. With CraveCast, you can explore a world of mouthwatering dishes through high-quality videos, personalized recommendations, and social interaction, all at your fingertips.

projects.title: Code-Mixed Sentiment Analysis Using Hybrid Deep Learning Models
projects.bodyText: This project aims to classify code-mixed (Hindi-English) social media text into positive or negative sentiments using a hybrid model of CNN, LSTM, and AdaBoost classifiers.

projects.title: Mark Your Trip
projects.bodyText: This is sample project of react and api calling (fake , real api) that help a user to mark its visited location across the world as an memory he/she can mark some notes on the pin location of map
